00036 Implemente_instanciable(MergeMEDfiles,"Merge_MED",Interprete);
00037 // XD Merge_MED interprete Merge_MED 0 This keyword allows to merge multiple MED files produced during a parallel computation into a single MED file.
00038 // XD attr med_files_base_name chaine med_files_base_name 0 Base name of multiple med files that should appear as base_name_xxxxx.med, where xxxxx denotes the MPI rank number. If you specify NOM_DU_CAS, it will automatically take the basename from your datafile's name.
00039 // XD attr time_iterations chaine(into=["all_times","last_time"]) time_iterations 0 Identifies whether to merge all time iterations present in the MED files or only the last one.
00040 
00041

00046 // Contraintes:
00047 // Acces: entree/sortie
00048 // Exception:
00049 // Effets de bord:
00050 // Postcondition: la methode ne modifie pas l'objet

00081 // Method that glob all med files found in the directory and returns
00082 // a list of strings
00083 std::vector<std::string> glob_med_files(const std::string& fileName)
00084 {
00085   glob_t glob_result;
00086 
00087   glob(fileName.c_str(),GLOB_TILDE,NULL,&glob_result);
00088 
00089   std::vector<std::string> ls_med;
00090   for(unsigned int i=0; i<glob_result.gl_pathc; ++i)
00091     ls_med.push_back(std::string(glob_result.gl_pathv[i]));
00092 
00093   globfree(&glob_result);
00094 
00095   return ls_med;
00096 }
00097 
00098 #ifdef MEDCOUPLING_
00099 // This is an internal function that performs the field merging
00100 // and write a single med file
00101 // Two cases are examined depending whether the field is a P0 or a P1 field
00102 void MergeMEDfiles::mergeFields(const std::vector< std::string >& field_names,
00103                                 const std::vector< std::string >& meshes_names,
00104                                 const std::vector<std::string>& listmed,
00105                                 const std::vector< std::pair< std::pair< True_int,True_int>,double >>& lst_dt,
00106                                 const int mesh_numb,
00107                                 const int iter_numb,
00108                                 Nom out_file,
00109                                 bool& first_time, const bool isCell) const
00110 {
00111 // Wee loop on all field names
00112   for (const auto & fld_name: field_names)
00113     {
00114       int fld_idx=0;
00115       std::vector<const MEDCouplingFieldDouble *> fields(listmed.size());
00116 // We loop over all med files
00117       for (size_t i=0; i<listmed.size(); i++)
00118         {
00119           MEDCouplingFieldDouble *f = nullptr;
00120           if (isCell)
00121             {
00122               f = dynamic_cast<MEDCouplingFieldDouble *>
00123                   (ReadFieldCell(listmed[i],meshes_names[mesh_numb] ,0,fld_name,
00124                                  lst_dt[iter_numb].first.first,lst_dt[iter_numb].first.second));
00125             }
00126           else
00127             {
00128               f = dynamic_cast<MEDCouplingFieldDouble *>
00129                   (ReadFieldNode(listmed[i],meshes_names[mesh_numb] ,0,fld_name,
00130                                  lst_dt[iter_numb].first.first,lst_dt[iter_numb].first.second));
00131             }
00132           if (f == nullptr)
00133             {
00134               Cerr << "Unexpected internal error!!" << finl;
00135               Process::exit(-1);
00136             }
00137           fields[fld_idx] = f;
00138           fld_idx++;
00139         } //!< end loop over all med files
00140       MCAuto<MEDCouplingFieldDouble> merged_field = MEDCouplingFieldDouble::MergeFields(fields);
00141       merged_field->mergeNodes(Objet_U::precision_geom, 1.0e-12);  //!< first epsilon for node coincidence, second for different field values if on nodes.
00142 
00143       if (je_suis_maitre())
00144         {
00145           if (first_time)
00146             WriteField(out_file.getString(),merged_field,true);
00147           else
00148             WriteField(out_file.getString(),merged_field,false); //!< append on the existing file
00149         }
00150 // the single med file is created. We will append it !
00151       first_time=0;
00152 
00153 // Memory release:
00154       for (auto & f: fields)
00155         f->decrRef();
00156     } //!< end loop over all field names
00157 }
00158 
00159 /* Used for lexicographical ordering of time steps */
00160 struct less_than_key
00161 {
00162   inline bool operator() (const std::pair< std::pair< int,int>,double >& a, const std::pair< std::pair< int,int>,double >& b) const
00163   {
00164     if (a.first.first == b.first.first)
00165       return (a.first.second < b.first.second);
00166     return (a.first.first < b.first.first);
00167   }
00168 };
00169 
00170 // Precondition:
00171 // Parametre: Entree& is
00172 // Signification: un flot d'entree
00173 // Valeurs par defaut:
00174 // Contraintes:
00175 // Acces: entree/sortie
00176 // Exception:
00177 // Effets de bord:
00178 // Postcondition:
00179 //
00180 //! MergeMEDfiles::interpreter(Entree\& is)
00181 /** \return Entree\&<br>
00182 Signification: le flot d'entree modifie<br>
00183 Contraintes: */
00184 Entree& MergeMEDfiles::interpreter(Entree& is)
00185 {
00186   Cerr<<"Syntax MergeMEDfiles::interpreter [NOM_DU_CAS|med_files_base_name] [all_times|last_time]"<<finl;
00187   Nom med_name,time_opt;
00188   is >> med_name>> time_opt;
00189 
00190   if (med_name == "NOM_DU_CAS")
00191     med_name= nom_du_cas();
00192 
00193   Nom files=med_name+"_*.med";
00194 
00195 // call the magic glob function
00196   std::vector<std::string> listmed=glob_med_files(files.getString());
00197 
00198   if (listmed.size() == 0)
00199     {
00200       Cerr << "No multiple med files with a basename " << med_name << " are present in this directory !" << finl;
00201       Cerr << "Verify your data file or check if the files " << med_name << "_xxxx.med are present in this directory !" << finl;
00202       Process::exit();
00203     }
00204   else
00205     {
00206       Cerr << "In process of merging " << (int)listmed.size() << " med files in a single med file ..." << finl;
00207     }
00208 
00209   const std::vector< std::string > meshes_names = GetMeshNames(listmed[0]);
00210 // GetAllFieldNames() works very good if all fields are written on a single mesh
00211 // see later GetAllFieldNamesOnMesh() while dealing with several meshes ...
00212   const std::vector< std::string > all_field_names = GetAllFieldNames(listmed[0]);
00213 
00214 // we use all_field_names[0] to check the iterations hoping that the med files are written correctly
00215 // with same number of iterations for all fields ...
00216   std::vector< std::pair< std::pair< True_int,True_int>,double >> lst_dt=GetAllFieldIterations(listmed[0],all_field_names[0]);
00217 // Sort the iterations incrementally ...
00218   std::sort(lst_dt.begin(), lst_dt.end(), less_than_key());
00219 
00220   int nb_steps = lst_dt.size();
00221   Cerr << "Number of iterations detected : " << nb_steps << finl;
00222   Cerr << "Number of meshes detected : " <<  (int)meshes_names.size() << finl;
00223 
00224 // TODO : FIXME : use  std::vector<std::vector<std::string>> to avoid multiple calls for MEDCoupling functions ??
00225 // std::vector< std::string > field_names;
00226   std::vector< std::string > cell_fields;
00227   std::vector< std::string > node_fields;
00228 
00229   int count = 0;
00230   for (size_t i=0; i<meshes_names.size(); i++)
00231     {
00232 // field_names = GetAllFieldNamesOnMesh(listmed[0],meshes_names[i]);
00233       cell_fields = GetCellFieldNamesOnMesh(listmed[0],meshes_names[i]);
00234       node_fields = GetNodeFieldNamesOnMesh(listmed[0],meshes_names[i]);
00235       int tot_fld_num = (int)cell_fields.size() + (int)node_fields.size();
00236       Cerr << "Number of fields detected on mesh " << (int)i +1 << " : " <<  tot_fld_num << finl;
00237       Cerr << " - Number of P0 fields : " << (int)cell_fields.size() << finl;
00238       Cerr << " - Number of P1 fields : " << (int)node_fields.size() << finl;
00239       count = count + tot_fld_num;
00240     }
00241 // check if it is ok
00242   assert(count == (int)all_field_names.size());
00243 
00244 // Output file we are waiting for
00245   Nom out_file=med_name+".med";
00246 // test if the single med file is created or no
00247   bool first_time = 1;
00248 
00249   size_t first_iter = time_opt == "last_time" ? (lst_dt.size()-1) : 0;
00250   for (size_t iter=first_iter; iter<lst_dt.size(); iter++) //!< loop over all iterations
00251     {
00252       for (size_t msh=0; msh<meshes_names.size(); msh++) //!< loop over all meshes
00253         {
00254           cell_fields = GetCellFieldNamesOnMesh(listmed[0],meshes_names[msh]);
00255           node_fields = GetNodeFieldNamesOnMesh(listmed[0],meshes_names[msh]);
00256 
00257           mergeFields(cell_fields,meshes_names,listmed,lst_dt,msh,iter,out_file,first_time, true);
00258           mergeFields(node_fields,meshes_names,listmed,lst_dt,msh,iter,out_file,first_time, false);
00259         }
00260     }
00261 
00262   return is;
00263 }
00264 
00265 #else /* No MEDCOUPLING_ */
00266 
00267 Entree& MergeMEDfiles::interpreter(Entree& is)
00268 {
00269   Cerr << "Version compiled without MEDCoupling" << finl;
00270   Process::exit();
00271 
00272   return is;
00273 }
